happiness.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
happiness.author: Dalai Lama

happiness.quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
happiness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

happiness.quote: The only thing that will make you happy is being happy with who you are.
happiness.author: Goldie Hawn

happiness.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
happiness.author: Dr. Seuss

happiness.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
happiness.author: Marcus Aurelius

happiness.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
happiness.author: Mahatma Gandhi

happiness.quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
happiness.author: Mark Twain

happiness.quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
happiness.author: John Lennon

happiness.quote: Learn to value yourself, which means: fight for your happiness.
happiness.author: Ayn Rand

motivation.quote: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
motivation.author: Walt Disney

motivation.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
motivation.author: Winston Churchill

motivation.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivation.author: Sam Levenson

motivation.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
motivation.author: Albert Schweitzer

motivation.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
motivation.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivation.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
motivation.author: C.S. Lewis

motivation.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
motivation.author: Zig Ziglar

motivation.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivation.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivation.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
motivation.author: Charles Kingsleigh

motivation.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
motivation.author: William B. Sprague

hardwork.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
hardwork.author: Colin Powell

hardwork.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
hardwork.author: Vidal Sassoon

hardwork.quote: Success is not in the never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
hardwork.author: Confucius

hardwork.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
hardwork.author: Robert Collier

hardwork.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
hardwork.author: Winston Churchill

hardwork.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
hardwork.author: Roy T. Bennett

hardwork.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
hardwork.author: Vince Lombardi

hardwork.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
hardwork.author: Albert Schweitzer

hardwork.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
hardwork.author: Charles Kingsleigh

hardwork.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
hardwork.author: William B. Sprague

peace.quote: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
peace.author: Albert Einstein

peace.quote: If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other.
peace.author: Mother Teresa

peace.quote: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind.
peace.author: Mahatma Gandhi

peace.quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
peace.author: Jimi Hendrix

peace.quote: If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner.
peace.author: Nelson Mandela

peace.quote: Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.
peace.author: Ronald Reagan

peace.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
peace.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

peace.quote: Imagine all the people living life in peace. You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us, and the world will be as one.
peace.author: John Lennon

peace.quote: If everyone demanded peace instead of another television set, then there'd be peace.
peace.author: John Lennon

peace.quote: Peace is a daily, a weekly, a monthly process, gradually changing opinions, slowly eroding old barriers, quietly building new structures.
peace.author: John F. Kennedy
